title: Can't identify font similar to Peignot
content:
Hey all.

Can anyone identify this typeface. Similar to Peignot

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010957im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ti_4389.jpg)
author: GustavH

comments.content: It is very similar but not strictly identical to Castle, of which there is a number of cuts by a wealth of foundry. Look around identifont for fonts similar to Castle and chances are you will find one that suits your needs. Also check dafont: some of the detailing suggests it might not be a professional font but a rip off.
